headline.main: The Battle of El Alamein; 'Drive' Provided by Auchinleck to Meet Rommel in Decisive Combat for Egypt

lead_paragraph: The battle for Egypt and all that Egypt means was approaching its crescendo yesterday at a desert crossroads that until two days ago was unknown to most of the western world.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
